text: "Are You Sure Hank Done It This Way" is a 1975 song by Waylon Jennings. It was taken from his 22nd studio album Dreaming My Dreams. It went to number 60 in the United States. It topped the single charts on the country charts. In 2010 it was covered by country band Alabama for the tribute album The Music Inside: A Collaboration Dedicated to Waylon Jennings, Volume One. ==References== Category:1975 songs Category:Country songs Category:Waylon Jennings songs Category:Clint Black songs Category:Hank Williams Jr. songs Category:Alabama (band) songs Category:The Mavericks songs
title: Are You Sure Hank Done It This Way
